thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Taiwan Military Tails Chinese Aircraft Carrier

author: Eva Dou
title: Taiwan Military Tails Chinese Aircraft Carrier

organizations.name: taiwan military tails chinese aircraft carrier

text:
BEIJING—Taiwan’s Defense Ministry said it sent ships and planes to monitor a Chinese aircraft carrier that entered the Taiwan Strait this week.

The rise in cross-strait tensions followed the U.S. passing a law greenlighting visits of senior officials between Washington and Taipei. The law’s passage drew protests in Beijing, which sees Taiwan as a renegade province. President Xi Jinping warned in a speech at the end of China’s annual legislative session that any attempt to divide China would fail and suffer the “punishment...
